languages: Revelation ch 17 vs 4 - And the woman was arrayed in purple and scarlet colour, and decked with gold and precious stones and pearls, having a golden cup in her hand full of abominations and filthiness of her fornication (woman represents a church) - you decide, but know this, the three angels message will happen sooner than later. - Italian (''de facto'')
demonym: officially: none;   unofficially: Vaticanian or Vaticano
